content: {A笑眯眯}Sweet and tangy, pretty and tasty. You can eat them as fruit or cook with them! I can't believe something as perfect as <style=Highlight>tomatoes</style> even exists!
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签5-12绵朵莉_12-绵朵莉

content: The dishes cooked with <style=Highlight>tomatoes</style> always turn out bright and lovely, just like how plushies feel. I like it very much.
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签5-12绵朵莉_12-绵朵莉
